summary: Victor and Hilary have guided tours in their English mansion. A US oil tycoon "bumps" into Hilary during a tour and charms his way into her heart. Meanwhile, Hattie pursues Victor.
cast: Cary Grant|Deborah Kerr|Robert Mitchum|Jean Simmons|Moray Watson|Joan Benham|Aileen Lewis|Leonard Llewellyn|Elisabeth Orion|Terry Sartain|Gwen Watford
